emcb.learned.block: You learned how to create this block!
emcb.learned.item: You learned how to create this item!
emcb.wand.block.disallowed.double: Cannot select this block: Blocks with more than one part are not allowed.
emcb.wand.block.disallowed.blacklist.sta: Cannot select this block: Block was blacklisted.
emcb.wand.block.disallowed.value: Cannot select this block: Block has no EMC Value.
emcb.wand.no_start_block: There is no start position defined. Please right-click a block to start.
emcb.wand.blocks_not_equal: Cannot select this block: not the same as the one at the start %s.
emcb.wand.not_enough_emc: You don't have enough EMC to do this operation. You would need %s more EMC to do it.
emcb.wand.need_empty_hand: You must have an empty hand to use this mode.
emcb.wand.mode.0.name: Fill and Replace Mode
emcb.wand.mode.0.result.neutral: Filled %s blocks and replaced %s blocks for no EMC change.
emcb.wand.mode.0.result.loss: Filled %s blocks and replaced %s blocks for a %s EMC cost.
emcb.wand.mode.0.result.gain: Filled %s blocks and replaced %s blocks for a %s EMC gain.
emcb.wand.mode.1.name: Fill-only Mode
emcb.wand.mode.1.result.neutral: Filled %s blocks for no EMC change.
emcb.wand.mode.1.result.loss: Filled %s blocks for a %s EMC cost.
emcb.wand.mode.1.result.gain: Filled %s blocks for a %s EMC gain.
emcb.wand.mode.2.name: Replace-only Mode
emcb.wand.mode.2.result.neutral: Replaced %s blocks for no EMC change.
emcb.wand.mode.2.result.loss: Replaced %s blocks for a %s EMC cost.
emcb.wand.mode.2.result.gain: Replaced %s blocks for a %s EMC gain.
emcb.wand.mode.3.name: Erase Mode
emcb.wand.mode.3.result.neutral: Erased %s blocks for no EMC change.
emcb.wand.mode.3.result.loss: Erased %s blocks for a %s EMC cost.
emcb.wand.mode.3.result.gain: Erased %s blocks for a %s EMC gain.
emcb.wand.mode.4.name: Block Picker Mode
emcb.wand.not_replaced_count: %s blocks were not replace as they were blacklisted.
emcb.config.wand.only_one_select: Start and end Blocks not the same
emcb.config.wand.only_one_select.desc: If you don't need to have the start block and the end block to be the same before actually replacing/filling the blocks. Default false.
emcb.config.wand.select_end: End Block is the one copied
emcb.config.wand.select_end.desc: If this option is selected, together with not requiring same start/end blocks, the block that will be copied will be the last one selected. Default false, meaning the copied block will be the starting one.
emcb.config.wand.blacklist.start.desc: Add here the resource location name (ie: "minecraft:dirt") of the blocks that will not be allowed as start block. (Note: These blocks will still be replaced with the replace feature. If you need to block that from happening, use the "Non-replaceable block list").
emcb.config.wand.blacklist.replace.desc: Add here the resource location name (ie: "minecraft:dirt") of the blocks that will not be replaced by the replace function. (Note: Blocks defined here will not be considered invalid for copying. For that use "Block selection Blacklist").
emcb.config.belt.fill_first.desc: If the belt will try to place the item in the inventory if you already have a compatible stack in there.
emcb.config.belt.ignore_tools.desc: If the belt will try to place the item in the inventory if it's a tool.
emcb.config.belt.blacklist.desc: Add here the resource location name (ie: "minecraft:dirt") of the items that will not be destroyed into EMC by the belt, if the inventory is not full.
emcb.config.belt.true_blacklist.desc: Add here the resource location name (ie: "minecraft:dirt") of the items that will not be destroyed into EMC by the belt, ever, even if it means not picking them up.
